mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_athlete (name, team, gender, event, birthday, number, photo_name, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{team}, #{gender}, #{event}, #{birthday}, #{number}, #{photoName}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_athlete WHERE team = #{team} ORDER BY id LIMIT #{pageQuery.offset}, #{pageQuery.pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM tb_athlete WHERE team = #{team}

SELECT MAX(id) FROM tb_athlete WHERE team = #{team}
